title: Gratitude
text: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you in favor.

title: Good Manners
text: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.

title: Patience Rewarded
text: Indeed, Allah is with the patient.

title: Morning Protection
text: O Allah, in Your name I begin my morning.

title: Trust Allah
text: Put your trust in Allah, and He is sufficient for you.

title: Do Not Despair
text: Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

title: Control Anger
text: The strong person is not the one who overcomes others by force, but the one who controls himself while in anger.

title: Remember Allah Often
text: O you who believe, remember Allah with much remembrance.

title: Suffering with Patience
text: No fatigue, nor disease, nor sorrow, nor sadness, nor hurt, nor distress befalls a Muslim, but Allah expiates some of his sins for that.

title: Help Neighbor
text: Jibril kept advising me to treat neighbors well until I thought he would assign them a share of inheritance.

title: Feed the Hungry
text: He who feeds a fasting person will have a reward like the one who fasts without diminishing the reward of the fasting person.

title: Small Deeds
text: Small deeds done consistently are better than great deeds done occasionally.
